text: The Iron Stair is a 1920 British silent-era crime film directed by F. Martin Thornton from the novel The Iron Stair by Rita. It starred Reginald Fox and Madge Stuart. A subsequent adaptation of the same story The Iron Stair was made in 1933 directed by Leslie S. Hiscott. ==References== ==External links== * Category:1920 films Category:1920 crime films Category:British films Category:British crime films Category:British silent feature films Category:Films directed by Floyd Martin Thornton Category:British black-and- white films
title: The Iron Stair (1920 film)
